entities.name: snitches
entities.description: Snitches are magical balls that carry an enchantment to identify the first human to lay hands upon it. They cannot be touched by bare skin before they are released.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student who is being considered for taking the Snitch with his bare hand in front of the Minister.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is Harry's friend and classmate who considers Hermione's Quidditch knowledge negligible.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student with extensive Quidditch knowledge that Ron and others consider negligible.

entities.name: scrimgeour
entities.description: Scrimgeour is the Minister who suggests that Dumbledore might have enchanted the Snitch to open only for Harry.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a former headmaster with prodigious magical skill who might have enchanted the Snitch.

entities.name: quidditch
entities.description: Quidditch is a sport played by students at Hogwarts.

relationships.description: Harry can touch the Snitch with his bare hand, but only after it has been released.
Scrimgeour suggests that Dumbledore might have enchanted the Snitch to open only for Harry.
Ron considers Hermione's Quidditch knowledge negligible.
Scrimgeour is concerned about Harry taking the Snitch with his bare hand in front of him.
